          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Friction between bicycle tyre and road</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion zwischen Fahrradreifen und Straße</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frottement entre le pneu de bicyclette et la 
route</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fricção entre o tyre da bicicleta e a estrada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrito fra il pneumatico della bicicletta e la 
strada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τριβή μεταξύ του ελαστικού αυτοκινήτου ποδηλάτων και 
του δρόμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fricción entre el neumático de la bicicleta y el
camino</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that a bicycle tyre should have a hard grip (large friction) with the road or it will skid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">road</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grip</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">skid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tyre</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt daß ein Fahrradreifen 
sollte einen harten Griff (große Friktion) mit der Straße haben, 
oder sie rutscht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'un pneu de bicyclette
devrait avoir une poignée dure (grand frottement) avec la route ou 
elle ensabotera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que um tyre da bicicleta 
deve ter um aperto duro (fricção grande) com a estrada ou 
derrapará.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che un pneumatico 
della bicicletta dovrebbe avere una presa dura (grande attrito) con la
strada o slitterà.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ένα ελαστικό 
αυτοκινήτου ποδηλάτων πρέπει να έχει ένα σκληρό πιάσιμο 
(μεγάλη τριβή) με το δρόμο ή θα ολισθήσει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que un neumático de la 
bicicleta debe tener un apretón duro (fricción grande) con el camino
o se patinará.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Straße</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reifen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">frottement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">route</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poignée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dérapage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pneu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fricção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
